item.description: Sunday July 26th at 7:05 pm. Meet in the lobby at 6:45 pm so we can get seats together. Movie rated R and is 96 minutes long. The battle of the sexes heats up in Columbia Pictures' comedy 'The Ugly Truth.' Abby Richter (Katherine Heigl) is a romantically challenged morning show producer whose search for Mr. Perfect has left her hopelessly single. She's in for a rude awakening when her bosses team her with Mike Chadway (Gerard Butler), a hardcore TV personality who promises to spill the ugly truth on what makes men and women tick. End your weekend with some laughs! Millbury Blackstone Shops theatres off of route 146.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the movie theatre lobby, I'll have a meetup sign
item.name: Sunday night movie (comedy) - The Ugly Truth @ 7:05 pm
